summary: Changes Stormcloak Officer Armor to Heavy Armor
descriptionHtml:
This file changes Stormcloak Officer Armor from Light Armor to Heavy Armor, making it usable with all Heavy Armor perks.  It has the same weight and armor rating as steel armor, and matches with it for the Matching Set perk.

To install, extract to your Data folder, and check the esp in Data Files in the game launcher. If Data Files is grayed out, add

bEnableFileSelection=1

to C:\\Users\\*Your User Name*\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini.
author: ClassicalNoodle
